title: Looking for Coach and Manager for Team Pix
body: Team Pix is a team that is looking to compete in the second split of OOL and make it to OCS. The team is currently looking for a Coach / Manager to improve in game play as well as manage scrims for each week. We are accepting people who are clearly interested in the position and hence will have no rank restrictions. Please contact Toot Toot in game or my self to under go trials.
